str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Of the Lord, special to the Lord. From kurios; belonging to the Lord.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
Behind, after; back, backwards. From the same as opisthen with enclitic of direction; to the back, i.e. Aback.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Large, great, in the widest sense.
Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
A trumpet, the sound of a trumpet. Perhaps from salos; a trumpet.
